mapper.sql: cash_back_id, money, discount, return_money, return_type, is_usable, create_time
mapper.update: UPDATE hqls_cash_back SET money = #{money}, discount = #{discount}, return_money = #{returnMoney}, return_type = #{returnType}, is_usable = #{isUsable}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE cash_back_id = #{cashBackId}
mapper.select:
SELECT cb.*, cu.customer_name as operate_user_name, CASE WHEN cb.return_type = 1 THEN '返利率' WHEN cb.return_type = 2 THEN '返还金额' ELSE '不存在的类型' END AS return_type_desc, CASE WHEN cb.return_type = 1 THEN concat( '满', cb.money, '返', concat(cb.discount * 100, '%')) WHEN return_type = 2 THEN concat( '满', cb.money, '返', concat(cb.money, '%')) ELSE '不存在的类型' END AS content FROM hqls_cash_back cb, hqls_customer cu WHERE cb.operate_user_id = cu.customer_id
AND cb.return_type = #{returnType}
AND cu.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{operateUserName}, '%')
AND datediff(cb.create_time,#{createTime})=0
